# MPMoviePlayerFullscreenAnimationCurveUserInfoKey | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Media Player ](/documentation/mediaplayer)

- [ MPMoviePlayerFullscreenAnimationCurveUserInfoKey ](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMoviePlayerFullscreenAnimationCurveUserInfoKey)

-  MPMoviePlayerFullscreenAnimationCurveUserInfoKey 

Global Variable# MPMoviePlayerFullscreenAnimationCurveUserInfoKey

iOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1DeprecatedtvOSDeprecated

```
let MPMoviePlayerFullscreenAnimationCurveUserInfoKey: String
```

Deprecated

Use AVPlayerViewController in AVKit

## [Discussion](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMoviePlayerFullscreenAnimationCurveUserInfoKey#Discussion)

The value of this key is an [`NSNumber`](/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber) containing an integer value that represents one of the [`UIView.AnimationCurve`](/documentation/UIKit/UIView/AnimationCurve) constants.
